titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of two Members to join with a like committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that the Congress is ready to receive any communications he may be pleased to make.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 3, the Speaker appointed Messrs. Gephardt and Michel as Members on the part of the House to a joint committee of the House and Senate to notify the President that the Congress had convened.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Provides for notification of the President that a quorum of each House of Congress has assembled.
